column3: ## Test Public Search Interactions
Go to the DOAJ journal search page at /search/journals

column4: All available records are found, and the first page of 50 results is shown
Only journals are shown.
Only facets relevant to journals appear on the left

column3: Change the results per page from 50 to 100 and back again

column4: The number of journals on the page increases and decreases and the number of pages changes

column3: Choose filters on the left (one or more at the time)

column4: Search results adjust accordingly
The number of search results changes. You can still select values from other facets and filters
The filters you have selected appear as black lozenges at the top of the search results

column3: Open and Collapse all the facets on the left

column4: The facet opens and closes as expected
Each facet contains a maximum of 40 values relevant to that field
No facet contains results with count 0

column3: Select one or more values in one facet

column4: The number of search results changes. You can still select values from other facets
The values you have selected appear as black lozenges at the top of the search results

column3: Click away the black lozenge(s)

column4: Search results adjust accordingly
The value deselects in the left-hand column

column3: Open and Collapse all the new facets on the left

column4: The facet opens and closes as expected
Each facet contains all the values for that field in a scrollable list.

column3: Select "Articles" from the Search menu

column4: All available article records are found, and the first page is shown
New facets appear on the left, that are relevant only to Articles

column3: Open and Collapse all the new facets on the left

column4: The facet opens and closes as expected
Each facet contains all the values for that field in a scrollable list.

column3: Switch back to 'Journals' in the top nav
Open the Journal License Facet
Select one of the CC licenses available

column4: All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown

column3: Click "Share | Embed" in the search navigation bar

column4: The search/embed box is shown with a URL and an HTML/JS snippet displayed in each box

column3: Close the "Share | Embed" section by clicking the Close button at the bottom of the box, or clicking the "Share | Embed" button again

column4: The share/embed section closes

column3: Go through each sort option in the "sort by" pull-down
In each case, click the "sort by" button to reverse the direction of sort

column4: The current search results are ordered correctly according to the selected sort field and the selected sort direction

column3: Enter a search term in the search box

column4: All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
Your search text ramains in the search box

column3: Go through each field constraint under the "search all" pull-down.  You may change your search text if no results are found, to demonstrate that each field works correctly

column4: If there are search results, the first page is displayed
If there are no search results, suitable "no results match" text is displayed

column3: Change the number of search results on the page, using the page-size pull-down

column4: The size of the page of results displays increases appropriately

column3: Click the "Next" button to go to the next page of results

column4: The next page of results is displayed
The "First" and "Prev" buttons are activated

column3: Click "Next" again
Click "Prev"

column4: You are navigated one page forward and then one page back in the results

column3: Click "First"

column4: You are taken to the first page of the results

column3: Click the black X button to clear all filters

column4: The interface returns to the initial state as per 1.1.1
